title: Scandinavia Suggested Itinerary - 2 Weeks in...
text:
FREE Newsletter. Sign Up Now! Road Trip! Get a taste of Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Finland with this tour of Scandinavia 
Want to avoid the midsummer heat of the Mediterranean? Scandinavia is the place to go. You'll find vibrant cities, stunning landscapes, and you'll get to spend some time cruising the seas if you follow our suggested itinerary. 
Our Scandinavia map shows the itinerary route, which offers a peek at Scandinavian capitals, as well as a ride on one of Europe's most scenic railroads, the Flam line. If you want to really get a sense of the "lay of the land" check out our relief map of Scandinavia . Scandinavia Map - 2 Week Itinerary Itinerary Map of Scandinavia Â© 2007-2013 by James Martin, licensed to About.com Starting from Copenhagen, Denmark 
Chances are, it'll be easier to get to Copenhagen for most folks, so our itinerary will start from here. You can do it in any order you want, of course. 
Copenhagen is one of my favorite cities in Europe. It's a great walking town, and it has a theme park called Tivoli that doesn't have people running around trying to look like giant rodents, so adults can enjoy it, too. 
You'll want to spend at least three days in Copenhagen. In fact, you'll want to spend at least three days in Each capital, along with on overnight in Flam, if you decide to take that detour. Copenhagen Resources:
